pageContext.claim: “Arrests of MS-13 Members, Associates Up 83% Under Trump”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted a link to a news article touting a statistic claimed by the Department of Homeland Security -- that arrests of gang members of La Mara Salvatrucha (MS-13) is up by 83 percent from 2016 to 2017. But experts say the numbers could be inflated because the government appears to be identifying people as gang members for the purposes of removal from the country.
